title: Diary of a student revolution
creator_credit: Morten Silverstein and National Educational Television
brief_description: An analysis of the question whether a University administration’s action in summoning the police force was an appropriate response to peaceful demonstrations on the Connecticut University campas. Trouble began at the University when industrial recruiting of students by Dow Chemical Company resulted in a confrontation between student activists and the University President.
